entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
